data.text/markdown:
Text Labeling Demo

This notebook demonstrates how to use the TextLabel widget for binary classification tasks.

Basic Text Classification

Let's create a simple sentiment analysis labeling task.

Instructions

  • Click Yes for positive sentiment
  • Click No for negative sentiment
  • Click Skip if unsure
  • Use Alt+2, Alt+3, Alt+4 for keyboard shortcuts
  • Add notes for context or edge cases

Custom Render Function

You can provide a custom render function to display examples in any format.

Export Annotations

After labeling, export your annotations for further processing.

Check Progress

Monitor your labeling progress.

Save to File

Save your annotations for later use.

Custom Keyboard Shortcuts

You can customize keyboard shortcuts to match your workflow.

data.text/html: <marimo-ui-element object-id='bkHC-0' random-id='7e4ef9a2-5ff6-17cd-9388-915c9c367c55'><marimo-anywidget data-initial-value='{"annotations":[{"index":0,"label":null,"notes":"","timestamp":null},{"index":1,"label":null,"notes":"","timestamp":null},{"index":2,"label":null,"notes":"","timestamp":null},{"index":3,"label":null,"notes":"","timestamp":null},{"index":4,"label":null,"notes":"","timestamp":null},{"index":5,"label":null,"notes":"","timestamp":null},{"index":6,"label":null,"notes":"","timestamp":null},{"index":7,"label":null,"notes":"","timestamp":null}],"current_index":0,"current_rendered":"I absolutely love this product! It exceeded all my expectations.","enable_notes":true,"keyboard_shortcuts":{"alt+1":"prev","alt+2":"yes","alt+3":"no","alt+4":"skip","alt+5":"focus_notes","alt+6":"speech_notes"},"total":8}' data-label='null' data-js-url='"./@file/5349-187151-s8dEmOSH.js"' data-js-hash='"802296451af1b3d2be3b678439d1a9d8"' data-css='"/* Adapted from koaning/molabel */\n\n.text-label-container {\n  font-family: -apple-system, BlinkMacSystemFont, \"Segoe UI\", Roboto, \"Helvetica Neue\", Arial, sans-serif;\n  max-width: 900px;\n  margin: 20px auto;\n  padding: 20px;\n  background: #ffffff;\n  border-radius: 8px;\n  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.1);\n}\n\n.text-label-header {\n  margin-bottom: 20px;\n}\n\n.progress-info {\n  font-size: 14px;\n  color: #666;\n  margin-bottom: 8px;\n  font-weight: 500;\n}\n\n.progress-bar {\n  width: 100%;\n  height: 6px;\n  background: #e0e0e0;\n  border-radius: 3px;\n  overflow: hidden;\n}\n\n.progress-fill {\n  height: 100%;\n  background: linear-gradient(90deg, #4CAF50, #45a049);\n  transition: width 0.3s ease;\n}\n\n.text-label-content {\n  min-height: 200px;\n  padding: 24px;\n  margin: 20px 0;\n  background: #f9f9f9;\n  border-radius: 6px;\n  border: 1px solid #e0e0e0;\n  font-size: 16px;\n  line-height: 1.6;\n}\n\n.text-label-buttons {\n  display: flex;\n  gap: 10px;\n  justify-content: center;\n  flex-wrap: wrap;\n  margin: 20px 0;\n}\n\n.btn {\n  padding: 10px 20px;\n  font-size: 14px;\n  font-weight: 500;\n  border: none;\n  border-radius: 6px;\n  cursor: pointer;\n  transition: all 0.2s ease;\n  outline: none;\n}\n\n.btn:hover:not(:disabled) {\n  transform: translateY(-1px);\n  box-shadow: 0 2px 8px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.15);\n}\n\n.btn:active:not(:disabled) {\n  transform: translateY(0);\n}\n\n.btn:disabled {\n  opacity: 0.4;\n  cursor: not-allowed;\n}\n\n.btn-secondary {\n  background: #6c757d;\n  color: white;\n}\n\n.btn-secondary:hover:not(:disabled) {\n  background: #5a6268;\n}\n\n.btn-yes {\n  background: #4CAF50;\n  color: white;\n}\n\n.btn-yes:hover:not(:disabled) {\n  background: #45a049;\n}\n\n.btn-yes.active {\n  background: #2e7d32;\n  box-shadow: inset 0 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);\n}\n\n.btn-no {\n  background: #f44336;\n  color: white;\n}\n\n.btn-no:hover:not(:disabled) {\n  background: #da190b;\n}\n\n.btn-no.active {\n  background: #c62828;\n  box-shadow: inset 0 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);\n}\n\n.btn-skip {\n  background: #ff9800;\n  color: white;\n}\n\n.btn-skip:hover:not(:disabled) {\n  background: #fb8c00;\n}\n\n.btn-skip.active {\n  background: #ef6c00;\n  box-shadow: inset 0 2px 4px rgba(0, 0, 0, 0.2);\n}\n\n.text-label-notes {\n  margin-top: 20px;\n}\n\n.text-label-notes label {\n  display: block;\n  font-size: 14px;\n  font-weight: 500;\n  color: #333;\n  margin-bottom: 8px;\n}\n\n.notes-input {\n  width: 100%;\n  padding: 10px;\n  font-size: 14px;\n  font-family: inherit;\n  border: 1px solid #ddd;\n  border-radius: 4px;\n  resize: vertical;\n  outline: none;\n  transition: border-color 0.2s ease;\n}\n\n.notes-input:focus {\n  border-color: #4CAF50;\n  box-shadow: 0 0 0 3px rgba(76, 175, 80, 0.1);\n}\n"' data-buffer-paths='[]'></marimo-anywidget></marimo-ui-element>
